ygData.subject: I doubt there is a reel
ygData.msgSnippet: Just my 2c worth, but I seriously doubt there is a reel of any sort in the formula.  Considering the level of technology we are dealing with, a fishing pole
ygData.messageBody:
Just my 2c worth, but I seriously doubt there is a reel of any sort in the
formula. Considering the level of technology we are dealing with, a fishing
pole was little more then a stick with a string tied at the end and a hook
at the end of the string.

That brings up a rather interesting thought, though - a hook. Probably not
likely, but might be worth trying if something can be used as a hook or if
there is something from which a hook can be made.

Tinik, Veeshan
